SPORT FESTIVAL EVENTS
26  February,  2024
The program "Promoters" organized a sports day festival for elementary school students
,
with the participation of three elementary schools
.
The number of participants in the event reached 55
,
and it included various sports activities for the participants
.
This event was organized in collaboration with Deepika Secondary School.
